title.rendered: Autodesk Navisworks Manage 2020 | For Windows | 1year student License

content.rendered:
Navisworks Manage 2020 from Autodesk is advanced project evaluation software that gives you with greater control over your project results. Create simulations of designs, check for errors between models and adjust accordingly, all within a user-friendly environment. Navisworks Manage 2020 from Autodesk is designed specifically for architects, engineers and building professionals.

 

Product description Navisworks Manage 2020

Get great deals when you buy Navisworks Manage 2020

Get special deals when you buy Navisworks Manage 2020 from Cadac Store. As an Autodesk Platinum Partner, we are able to offer Autodesk software at the best price and with the best service. Log in to My Cadac Store or create a free account and discover the benefits for your business.

Evaluate your project with Navisworks Manage 2020

The innovative Navisworks Manage 2020 software provides you with advanced simulation and validation tools to effectively evaluate design projects. Navisworks Manage 2020 has clash detection features to detect errors, making the software more comprehensive than Autodesk Navisworks Simulate 2020. Clash detection helps you quickly detect errors and resolve conflicts before the design goes into production – with the aim of minimizing delays and avoiding duplication of work.

In addition, Autodesk Navisworks Manage 2020 enables you to analyze and evaluate your model in detail. To enable this, you combine different designs from the various disciplines within your project. Navisworks Manage 2020 supports more than 60 different file formats. Various tools are also available including measuring tools, a redline tool and communication tools.

Perform high-quality simulations to visually inspect your project. The 5D simulation also takes scheduling and costs into account. Create illustrative animations and assign colors to your designs. In most cases, construction projects are highly complex so these visual simulations are very valuable for your company.

With innovative clash detection, design simulation and advanced coordination tools, Autodesk Navisworks Manage 2020 is the ideal software to improve your project evaluation processes.
